markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, there are these four meditators. What four?

One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in emerging from it. …”

SN.34.4. Samādhimūlakakallitasutta (“Gladdening for Immersion”)

What four?
One meditator is skilled in immersion but not in emerging from it. …”
